name: eventbrite-create-event
description: Create a new Eventbrite event. [See the documentation](https://www.eventbrite.com/platform/api#/reference/event/create/create-an-event)

name.description: Event name. Value cannot be empty nor whitespace

summary.description: Event summary. This is a plaintext field and will have any supplied HTML removed from it. Maximum of 140 characters

startTime.description: The event start time relative to UTC. (Ex. 2018-05-12T02:00:00Z).

endTime.description: The event end time relative to UTC. (Ex. 2018-05-12T02:00:00Z)

hideStartDate.description: Whether the start date should be hidden. Defaults to false if left blank.

hideEndDate.description: Whether the end date should be hidden. Defaults to false if left blank.

currency.description: The ISO 4217 currency code for this event

onlineEvent.description: If this event doesn't have a venue and is only held online. Defaults to false if left blank.

logoId.description: Image ID of the event logo

listed.description: Is this event publicly searchable on Eventbrite? Defaults to true.

shareable.description: Can this event show social sharing buttons? Defaults to false if left blank.

inviteOnly.description: Can only people with invites see the event page?. Defaults to false if left blank.

showRemaining.description: If the remaining number of tickets is publicly visible on the event page. Defaults to false if left blank.

password.description: Password needed to see the event in unlisted mode

capacity.description: Set specific capacity (if omitted, sums ticket capacities)

isReservedSeating.description: If the event is reserved seating. Defaults to false if left blank.

isSeries.description: If the event is part of a series. Specifying this attribute as True during event creation will always designate the event as a series parent, never as a series occurrence. Series occurrences must be created through the schedules API and cannot be created using the events API. Defaults to false if left blank.

showPickASeat.description: For reserved seating event, if attendees can pick their seats. Defaults to false if left blank.

showSeatmapThumbnail.description: For reserved seating event, if venue map thumbnail visible on the event page. Defaults to false if left blank.

showColorsInSeatmapThumbnail.description: For reserved seating event, if venue map thumbnail should have colors on the event page. Defaults to false if left blank.

source.description: Source of the event (defaults to API)

locale.description: Indicates event language on Event's listing page. Language options from Eventbrite documentation: https://www.eventbrite.com/platform/api#/reference/event/retrieve/create-an-event

name: eventbrite-get-event-attendees
description: Get event attendees for a specified event. [See the documentation](https://www.eventbrite.com/platform/api#/reference/attendee/list/list-attendees-by-event)

name: eventbrite-get-event-details
description: Get details for a specified event. [See the documentation](https://www.eventbrite.com/platform/api#/reference/event/retrieve/retrieve-an-event)

name: eventbrite-get-event-summary
description: Get event summary for a specified event. [See the documentation](https://www.eventbrite.com/platform/api#/reference/event/retrieve/retrieve-an-event)

name: eventbrite-get-my-orders
description: Get a list of event orders placed by the authenticated user. [See the documentation](https://www.eventbrite.com/platform/docs/order-lookup)
